txt.en: Destroy the Dark Forge of Isengard before its protectors fall
Complete the Challenge Mode in the Foundry
You have destroyed the Dark Forge of Isengard, then its protectors
Saruman uses the great forge in the Foundry of Isengard to craft for himself rings of power.
You have defeated TBD Bellows Master in the Foundry Beneath Isengard on Tier 1.
You have defeated the Dark Ringforge of Isengard and its protectors on Tier 1
To earn this deed, you must destroy the Dark Ring-forge of Isengard before its defenders fall.
To earn this deed, you must defeat TBD Slag the Smelter, TBD Bellows Master, and The Dark Ring-forge of Isengard and it's protectors.
Destroy the Dark Forge of Isengard before its protectors fall
Complete the Challenge Mode in the Foundry
Defeat the Dark Ringforge of Isengard and its protectors.
